snp5.1:16.4: Jinānaṃ hettha → jinānaṃ hettha (bj) | jinānaṃ heta (si) | jinānaṃ heta (s1-3, pts1)
snp5.1:17.2: pathavimaṇḍale → puthuvi maṇḍale (bj) | puthavimaṇḍale (bj, pts1) | paṭhavimaṇḍale (s1-3)
snp5.1:22.5: gantvāna passemu → gantvā namassemu (bj, s1-3, pts1)
snp5.1:27.3: Dvattiṃsāni ca → dvattiṃsā ca (si, s1-3, pts1) | dvattiṃsa tāni (?)
snp5.1:38.2: Purimāhissatiṃ → purimaṃ māhissatiṃ (bj, pts1) | puraṃ māhissatiṃ (s1-3)
snp5.1:43.2: Sataraṃsiṃva → vītaraṃsiṃva (si, s1-3) | vītaraṃsiva (pts1) | sataraṃsīva (mr) | pītaraṃsiṃva (^cnd1#42 [Vatthugāthā])
